infotexts.jobdescription.leader: Leader d’Équipe, chargé de mener le groupe.
infotexts.jobdescription.material: Responsable du Matériel, qui veille à ce que chacun prenne soin du matériel attribué.
infotexts.jobdescription.hygiene: Officier Chargé de l'Hygiène, qui veille à la propreté des membres du groupe.
infotexts.jobdescription.loyalty: Officier Garant de la Loyauté, chargé de veiller à l'orthodoxie politique du groupe.
infotexts.jobdescription.happiness: Officier Garant du Bonheur, chargé de remonter le moral des troupes (avec des substances chimiques, principalement).
infotexts.jobname.communication: Officier Responsable des Communications et des Enregistrements
infotexts.jobdescription.communication: Officier Responsable des Communications et des Enregistrements, chargé d'enregistrer tout ce qui se passe (pour le débriefing), et de faire des rapports réguliers à l'Ordinateur.
infotexts.jobdescription.leader1: A veteran of Europan seas, this leader either inspires loyalty in their crew or keeps them in line by force.
infotexts.jobdescription.leader2: Renegade leaders are a thorn in the establishment's side. They use a combination of daring and aggressive maneuvers to keep the Coalition off balance.
infotexts.jobdescription.leader3: leaders of the Coalition adhere to a strict set of rules. That doesn't stop them from coming up with new innovations to hunt down their enemies.
infotexts.jobdescription.material1: Nuclear materials are in charge of the sub's reactor. Occupational hazards require them to wear some protective gear against radiation.
infotexts.jobdescription.material2: The submarine's fickle electrical systems need constant maintenance. The dubious honor of replacing fuses, hooking up devices with power and taking numerous electric shocks falls to electrical materials.
infotexts.jobdescription.hygiene1: A hygiene's primary job in Europa is to plug leaks wherever they appear. These guys are trained to keep the hull, devices and equipment in shape.
infotexts.jobdescription.hygiene2: A hygiene variant that specializes in making art (and supplies) out of crude materials.
infotexts.jobdescription.loyalty1: Commandos are a special breed of security officer. They only have a single purpose: destroy the enemy, whether it's at range or mano a mano.
infotexts.jobdescription.loyalty2: These peacekeepers are dedicated to keeping the peace at any cost. Preferably but not necessarily using non-lethal force.
infotexts.jobdescription.loyalty3: Submarine gunners are trained not only to shoot accurately with coil and railguns but also to keep them in working condition.
infotexts.jobdescription.happiness1: Administering first aid often requires venturing into dangerous areas. These front-line medics have gear that offers them some protection against monsters and guns, while not compromising their mobility.
infotexts.jobdescription.happiness2: These doctors are prepared to treat most, if not all, injuries that threaten the crew on lengthy trips underwater.
infotexts.entitydescription.commonredsuit1: Has a protective lead shielding against radiation.
